text: Morris Weiss (August 11, 1915 â€“ May 18, 2014) was an American comic book and comic strip artist and writer. His career began in 1930. He would retire in 1970. Weiss worked with Marvel Comics. He is known for creating Mickey Finn and Joe Palooka. Weiss died from natural causes, aged 98. ==References== Category:1915 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American comics artists Category:American comics writers Category:Writers from Philadelphia
title: Morris Weiss
